overview: Every people, every human being, has a need to assert themselves. However, one can only assert oneself through one’s culture. My Father is Goun and my Mother is Natemba. It was in the quest to learn more about my identity Nateni that the idea of making a documentary was born, to arouse the desire to perpetuate this architecture and thus contribute to the influence of universal civilization.
title: Nateni, My Identity
